body.p: supports WordPerfect document formats that were created with WordPerfect Version 5.x, Version 6.0, and Version 6.1. You can import these documents into using the EQFWP (for WordPerfect Version 5.x documents) or EQFWP6 (for WordPerfect Version 6.0 and 6.1 documents) markup table.

When you have translated the document, you can export it in external format and load it back into WordPerfect to generate a new index and new table of contents, for example, to print and review the translation.
body.note: During translation, segments spanning more than two lines in the Translation window are joined including a blank space. As an exception to this rule, a blank is not inserted if an inline tag (such as [bold] or [italic]) is found at the end of a line. However, if you need a blank between the tag and the first word of the following line, it is recommended to join the lines such that no line ends with a tag or to start the following line with a blank before the first word.
